tooltip.kingdoms.border_wand: Select kingdom borders by marking corners.
tooltip.kingdoms.kingdom_block: Creates and manages a kingdom at this location.
tooltip.kingdoms.treasure_block: Treasury interface: view resources and buy job blocks.
tooltip.kingdoms.grain_block: Farm building. Produces grain each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.butcher_block: Butchery building. Produces meat each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.fish_block: Fishing hut. Produces fish each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.wood_block: Lumber camp. Produces wood each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.metal_block: Ore mine. Produces metal each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.gem_block: Gem mine. Produces gems each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.alchemy_block: Alchemy lab. Produces potions each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.weapon_block: Blacksmith. Produces weapons each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.armor_block: Armorer. Produces armor each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.stable_block: Stable. Produces horses each work cycle.
tooltip.kingdoms.guard_block: Guard post. Consumes supplies to maintain guards.
tooltip.kingdoms.training_block: Training yard. Consumes supplies to train troops.
tooltip.kingdoms.garrison_block: Garrison. Consumes supplies to maintain a standing force.
tooltip.kingdoms.chapel_block: Chapel. Consumes supplies to provide stability and services.
tooltip.kingdoms.tavern_block: Tavern. Consumes supplies and generates income.
tooltip.kingdoms.shop_block: Shop. Converts materials into gold through trade.
tooltip.kingdoms.nobility_block: Noble estate. Generates gold and governance capacity.
